---
description: "Run a quick Well-Architected compliance check on the current repository against the GitHub Well-Architected Framework."
agent: "WellArchitected"
tools: ["web", "read", "search"]
---

Perform a full Well-Architected compliance audit on this repository.

1. Fetch the latest framework guidance from https://wellarchitected.github.com
2. Scan all repository configuration files, workflows, and documentation
3. Score each pillar (Security, Reliability, Operational Excellence, Performance Efficiency, Collaboration)
4. Produce the full compliance report with specific, actionable recommendations
5. Highlight the top 3 priority fixes to improve compliance immediately
